lead_paragraph: The festival will be hosted by the city of Laconia after its longtime host city, Keene, declined to issue a permit following violence that led to more than 100 arrests near last year’s event.

headline.print_headline: New Hampshire: New Host City Named for Pumpkin Festival
headline.main: New Hampshire: New Host City Named for Pumpkin Festival

snippet: The festival will be hosted by the city of Laconia after its longtime host city, Keene, declined to issue a permit following violence that led to more than 100 arrests near last year’s event.
abstract: Laconia, NH, will host annual New Hampshire Pumpkin Festival, which was banished from longtime host city Keene after 2014 event was ruined when local college students went on drunken rampage resulting in over 100 arrests.
